controls.name: control_9a1d3240-32b8-11ee-aaf4-5bc3d06c215e
controls.label: Print Purchase Order
controls.customCode:
<b-spinner variant="primary" v-if="$getGlobalModel('printing')" />
<b-button
    v-else
    variant='success'
    @click='printpurchaseorder(rowData)'
>Print Purchase Order</b-button>

title: Purchase Orders
